enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The twentieth sessions of SBI and SBSTA met from 16-25 June 2004, in Bonn.
Among other things, SBSTA-20 considered small-scale afforestation and reforestation CDM project activities and good practice guidance on LULUCF.
SBI-20 addressed the UNFCCCs financial mechanism and arrangements for intergovernmental meetings.
Discussions on these issues are expected to continue at the 21st sessions of SBI and SBSTA in Buenos Aires.
Two in-session workshops were also held; one on adaptation, and the other on mitigation.
